alert.note: Alert for Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 3:12PM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Ransom County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
